23 class ModelViewer extends FormModelViewerTrait {

36  public function __construct(HasModelViewerInterface $controller) {
37  $this->jquery = $controller->jquery;
38  $this->controller = $controller;
39  }
40 
51  public function getModelDataElement($instance, $model, $modal) {
52  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
53  $fields = $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getElementFieldNames ( $model );
54 
55  $dataElement = $semantic->dataElement ( "de", $instance );
56  $pk = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance );
57  $dataElement->getInstanceViewer ()->setIdentifierFunction ( function () use ($pk) {
58  return $pk;
59  } );
60  $dataElement->setFields ( $fields );
61  $dataElement->setCaptions ( $this->getElementCaptions ( $fields, $model, $instance ) );
62 
63  $fkInstances = CRUDHelper::getFKIntances ( $instance, $model );
64  foreach ( $fkInstances as $member => $fkInstanceArray ) {
65  if (array_search ( $member, $fields ) !== false) {
66  $dataElement->setValueFunction ( $member, function () use ($fkInstanceArray, $member) {
67  return $this->getFkMemberElement ( $member, $fkInstanceArray ["objectFK"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkClass"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkTable"] );
68  } );
69  }
70  }
71  $this->addEditMemberFonctionality ( "dataElement" );
72  return $dataElement;
73  }
74 
82  public function getElementCaptions($captions, $className, $instance) {
83  return array_map ( "ucfirst", $captions );
84  }
85 
93  public function getModelDataTable($instances, $model, $totalCount, $page = 1) {
94  $adminRoute = $this->controller->_getBaseRoute ();
95  $files = $this->controller->_getFiles ();
96  $dataTable = $this->getDataTableInstance ( $instances, $model, $totalCount, $page );
97  $attributes = $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getFieldNames ( $model );
98  $this->setDataTableAttributes ( $dataTable, $attributes, $model, $instances );
99  $dataTable->setCaptions ( $this->getCaptions ( $attributes, $model ) );
100 
101  $dataTable->addClass ( "small very compact" );
102  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "search-query", "<span id='search-query-content'></span>" );
103  $icon = $lbl->addIcon ( "delete", false );
104  $lbl->wrap ( "<span>", "</span>" );
105  $lbl->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
106  $icon->getOnClick ( $adminRoute . $files->getRouteRefreshTable (), "#lv", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => "internal" ] );
107 
108  $dataTable->addItemInToolbar ( $lbl );
109  $dataTable->addSearchInToolbar ();
110  $dataTable->setToolbarPosition ( PositionInTable::FOOTER );
111  $dataTable->getToolbar ()->setSecondary ();
112  return $dataTable;
113  }
114 
115  public function setDataTableAttributes(DataTable $dataTable, $attributes, $model, $instances, $selector = null) {
116  $modal = ($this->isModal ( $instances, $model ) ? "modal" : "no");
117 
118  $adminRoute = $this->controller->_getBaseRoute ();
119  $files = $this->controller->_getFiles ();
120  $dataTable->setButtons ( $this->getDataTableRowButtons () );
121  $dataTable->setFields ( $attributes );
122  if (array_search ( "password", $attributes ) !== false) {
123  $dataTable->setValueFunction ( "password", function ($v) {
124  return UString::mask ( $v );
125  } );
126  }
127  $dataTable->setIdentifierFunction ( CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $model ) );
128 
129  if (! isset ( $selector )) {
130  if ($this->showDetailsOnDataTableClick ()) {
131  $dataTable->getOnRow ( "click", $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDetails (), "#table-details", [ "selector" => $selector,"attr" => "data-ajax","hasLoader" => false,"jsCondition" => "!event.detail || event.detail==1","jsCallback" => "return false;" ] );
132  $dataTable->setActiveRowSelector ( "active" );
133  }
134 
135  $dataTable->setUrls ( [ "refresh" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteRefresh (),"delete" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDelete (),"edit" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteEdit () . "/" . $modal,"display" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDisplay () . "/" . $modal ] );
136  $dataTable->setTargetSelector ( [ "delete" => "#table-messages","edit" => "#frm-add-update","display" => "#table-details" ] );
137  $this->addEditMemberFonctionality ( "dataTable" );
138  }
139  $this->addAllButtons ( $dataTable, $attributes );
140  }
141 
142  public function addEditMemberFonctionality($part) {
143  if (($editMemberParams = $this->getEditMemberParams ()) !== false) {
144  if (isset ( $editMemberParams [$part] )) {
145  $params = $editMemberParams [$part];
146  $params->compile ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute (), $this->jquery, $part );
147  }
148  }
149  }
150 
157  public function recordsPerPage($model, $totalCount = 0) {
158  if ($totalCount > 6)
159  return 6;
160  return;
161  }
162 
166  public function getGroupByFields() {
167  return;
168  }
169 
179  protected function getDataTableInstance($instances, $model, $totalCount, $page = 1): DataTable {
180  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
181  $recordsPerPage = $this->recordsPerPage ( $model, $totalCount );
182  if (is_numeric ( $recordsPerPage )) {
183  $grpByFields = $this->getGroupByFields ();
184  if (is_array ( $grpByFields )) {
185  $dataTable = $semantic->dataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
186  $dataTable->setGroupByFields ( $grpByFields );
187  } else {
188  $dataTable = $semantic->jsonDataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
189  }
190  $dataTable->paginate ( $page, $totalCount, $recordsPerPage, 5 );
191  $dataTable->onActiveRowChange ( '$("#table-details").html("");' );
192  $dataTable->onSearchTerminate ( '$("#search-query-content").html(data);$("#search-query").show();$("#table-details").html("");' );
193  } else {
194  $dataTable = $semantic->dataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
195  }
196  return $dataTable;
197  }
198 
204  protected function getDataTableRowButtons() {
205  return [ "edit","delete" ];
206  }
207 
208  public function addAllButtons(DataTable $dataTable, $attributes) {
209  $dataTable->onPreCompile ( function () use (&$dataTable) {
210  $dataTable->getHtmlComponent ()->colRightFromRight ( 0 );
211  } );
212  $dataTable->addAllButtons ( false, [ "ajaxTransition" => "random" ], function ($bt) {
213  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
214  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
215  }, function ($bt) {
216  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
217  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
218  }, function ($bt) {
219  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
220  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
221  } );
222  $dataTable->setDisplayBehavior ( [ "jsCallback" => '$("#dataTable").hide();',"ajaxTransition" => "random" ] );
223  }

231  }

248  public function getCaptions($captions, $className) {
249  return \array_map ( "ucfirst", $captions );

260  public function getFkHeaderElementDetails($member, $className, $object) {
261  return new HtmlHeader ( "", 4, $member, "content" );
262  }

272  public function getFkHeaderListDetails($member, $className, $list) {
273  return new HtmlHeader ( "", 4, $member . " (" . \count ( $list ) . ")", "content" );
274  }

284  public function getFkElementDetails($member, $className, $object) {
285  return $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlLabel ( "element-" . $className . "." . $member, $object . "" );
286  }
287 
296  public function getFkListDetails($member, $className, $list) {
297  $element = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlList ( "list-" . $className . "." . $member );
298  $element->setMaxVisible ( 15 );
299 
300  return $element->addClass ( "animated divided celled" );
301  }
302 
312  public function getFkMemberElementDetails($memberFK, $objectFK, $fkClass, $fkTable) {
313  $_fkClass = str_replace ( "\\", ".", $fkClass );
314  $header = new HtmlHeader ( "", 4, $memberFK, "content" );
315  if (is_array ( $objectFK ) || $objectFK instanceof \Traversable) {
316  $header = $this->getFkHeaderListDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
317  $element = $this->getFkListDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
318  foreach ( $objectFK as $oItem ) {
319  if (method_exists ( $oItem, "__toString" )) {
320  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $oItem );
321  $item = $element->addItem ( $oItem . "" );
322  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id );
323  $item->addClass ( "showTable" );
324  $this->onDisplayFkElementListDetails ( $item, $memberFK, $fkClass, $oItem );
325  }
326  }
327  } else {
328  if (method_exists ( $objectFK, "__toString" )) {
329  $header = $this->getFkHeaderElementDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
330  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $objectFK );
331  $element = $this->getFkElementDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
332  $element->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id )->addClass ( "showTable" );
333  }
334  }
335  if (isset ( $element )) {
336  return [ $header,$element ];
337  }
338  return null;
339  }
340 
349  public function onDisplayFkElementListDetails($element, $member, $className, $object) {
350  }
351 
361  public function getFkMemberElement($memberFK, $objectFK, $fkClass, $fkTable) {
362  $element = "";
363  $_fkClass = str_replace ( "\\", ".", $fkClass );
364  if (is_array ( $objectFK ) || $objectFK instanceof \Traversable) {
365  $element = $this->getFkList ( $memberFK, $objectFK );
366  foreach ( $objectFK as $oItem ) {
367  if (method_exists ( $oItem, "__toString" )) {
368  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $oItem );
369  $item = $element->addItem ( $oItem . "" );
370  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id );
371  $item->addClass ( "showTable" );
372  $this->displayFkElementList ( $item, $memberFK, $fkClass, $oItem );
373  }
374  }
375  } else {
376  if (method_exists ( $objectFK, "__toString" )) {
377  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $objectFK );
378  $element = $this->getFkElement ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
379  $element->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id )->addClass ( "showTable" );
380  }
381  }
382  return $element;
383  }

393  public function getFkList($member, $list) {
394  $element = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlList ( "list-" . $member );
395  $element->setMaxVisible ( 10 );
396  return $element->addClass ( "animated" );
397  }

427  public function showDetailsOnDataTableClick() {
428  return true;
